page.title: 15LIFE STYLES IN BUCHANAN
page.content:
Vegetable growing
In Milton of Buchanan 10 people grow vegetables. They grow lettuce,cabbage, carrots,peas and beans. Some people grow flowers but mostly they grow vegetables. Some people grow both flowers and vegetables. Water supply All the houses have mains water supply except one cottage. It has a private supply. This cottage is in a very remote area and uses a spring for its water supply. Electricity One house in the Milton of Buchanan has a generator for electricity. Every one else uses the hydro electric supply. When there is a power failure the people use candles.
